alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 9:28PM MST until January 01 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches mainly in eastern portions of the Tooele Valley and areas south and southeast of the Great Salt Lake in the Salt Lake Valley. * WHERE...Salt Lake Valley and Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
